dimensions: 3 h. x 27.5 diameter cm (1 3/16 x 10 13/16 in. )
title: "William Penn's Treaty"
description: Brown glazed decoration over white. Geometric design around the rim. In the central scene are four figures, two Europeans and two Native Americans. They are surrounded by palm trees, foliage, and there are additional figures in the background.
name: Plate
